ThingDef.label: insect paste meal
ThingDef.description: A coarse slime made from processed insect meat.

li.label: ate insect paste
li.description: I ate a tube full of processed insect-parts. The gear-oil helps mask the taste a bit.

ThingDef.label: insect brick meal
ThingDef.description: Dehydrated insect paste, wrapped in polymer made from inedible food-parts. Colloquially referred to as Bug-Bricks, in a hopeless attempt to distract from the taste.

li.label: ate insect brick
li.description: The dehydration process actually lessens the flavor of insect guts. It's still terrible, but it could be worse.
